value.title: Starcraft2: Protoss Build Order Guide (Dark Templars @ 4:25!)
value.excerpt: In today's Starcraft 2 guide/lesson we are looking at a very powerful protoss vs zerg build order. We drop dark templars at 4:24 and at the same time harass another bases drones with 3 adepts. Very difficult for zerg to defend.
